title: "A deep learning model rapidly predicts the 3D shapes of drug-like molecules"
excerpt: "In their quest to discover effective new medicines, scientists search for drug-like molecules that can attach to disease-causing proteins and change their functionality. It is crucial that they know the 3D shape of a molecule to understand how it will attach to specific surfaces of the protein."
